project.title: North Texas Topic Analysis
project.description:
This page demonstrates a topic-coded interview from North Texas, conducted by a student at UT Austin in the context of the Home To Texas program. Questions centered on change in the community over the decades, the community's sense of identity, and the participants' own biographies and experience. 

Topic coding was applied for this set of nine topics: 1. change, 2. identity, 3. diversity, 4. future, 5. sense of place, 6. livelihood/economy, 7. local governance, 8.infrastructure/services, and 9. generational relations. 

- Near the end, a reading passage is included.
project.creator: speaktexan
project.authors: Lars Hinrichs, Baylee Ross, Sydney Quant, Jennifer Smith
